attributes.action: Government funded campaign to raise awareness of vestibular disorders.
attributes.background: Vestibular disorders are debilitating and life ruining. They are relentless, scary, and lonely. Hard to get a diagnosis, sufferers are often left with no help or diagnosis. We want to raise awareness of things like vestibular migraine, vestibular neuritis, PPPD and Menieres disease.
